alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 25 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Oklahoma, including the following county, Bryan. * WHEN...Until 345 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1245 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has fallen early this morning with an estimated 2 and 3 inches of rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of East Central Bryan County south of Bokchito and Bennington and north of Albany and Wade. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
